summary: The Abandon Prison has been rebuilt by the Imperials.
descriptionHtml:
Since no one has considered to fix up the Abandon Prison, I\'ve decide to do it myself. Here are a list of changes:
* Removed all ghost.
* Removed all damaged parts of the exterior of the building.
* Removed all possible collapsed walls and rocks. 
* Blocked off several hallways that lead to no where.
* Repaired a damaged wall.
* Placed several guards in the prison. (they just stand there with torches..too lazy to make them patrol)
* Placed beds and tables in each cell
* Placed several prisoners in the cells.
* All cells have expert locks.
* reorganized armory room. 
* Build a bridge so the player could go across the river.

Let me know if there\'s any issues.
author: lunchbox94
